documents.document: @ar1k88 haha I know what your saying

@ar1k88 of course you have haha. Can you send over a gold scythe for meðŸ˜œI know people do it haha

@DyingLightGame @ar1k88 @BestGamerAliYT @JBoristheSpider do you get different weapons from dockets in the following or the same as campaign?
@ar1k88 he put it on YouTube I saw it
@RedneckOrdinary you don't have a gold tier scythe for dying light do you?
@ar1k88 also how did you find most of the others?
@ar1k88 I saw best gamer Ali found it but won't tell anyone how
@MagicBinkovski @Jeremy69657837 I don't think DL2 will be out for a few years. It takes ages to perfect a game like DL and DL1 is awesome!!
@RedneckOrdinary best give away ever!! Ps are you still playing dying light on PS4?
@ar1k88 hey did you ever get a gold scythe?
@BestGamerAliYT do you know where your friend got that gold scythe from?
@ar1k88 any tips for a noob hunter? I'm at level 8 so far haha
@ar1k88 @DyingLightGame I've got a couple from them but still I wish they wouldn't be so hard to find and when you it's the same ones!!
@DyingLightGame is there any chance you can change the % for golds to a bit higher I've been playing since day one and still need more
@OPERATIONiDROID do you know of any cheats working for Pokemon cloud white? I can't find any that work
@ar1k88 @DyingLightGame awesome :) keep me updated I'll be waiting on a stream!!
@ar1k88 @DyingLightGame yay thanks arik!! :) also have you got your pc running again?
@DyingLightGame @ar1k88 so is there still support happening for game is it finished now? Also is there going to be more events?
@JBoristheSpider awesome montage bro. Crazy kills. Keep them coming
@ar1k88 if he thinks your not good enough the speed demon can come play haha
@ar1k88 maybe numbers should remake an appearance if he's ready for you
@ar1k88 oh really?? :( devo bro. Good luck with the pc side of it :) let me know when your back up and running still a fan boy hahaha
@ar1k88 before you finally leave ps for good please verse mafe and record I'm seriously keen as for that match!!
@ar1k88 @DyingLightGame who else is there? I only trust your stuff lol. I guess ill be buying a pc as well then
@ar1k88 no arik!! Ash told me last night. Who is going to find our glitches now?
@DyingLightGame hey guys hyper mode isn't working for me. I play on nightmare. Any help would be great
@DyingLightGame @ar1k88 with the challenge this weekend I'm guessing you can play either survivor or hunter but can you play as both?
@DyingLightGame was just wondering if any of your devs have any vids I can watch them playing as a survivor keen to see them in action
@OPERATIONiDROID @builds_io is their a pc emulator for iOS? I'm looking to play the old age of empires on my phone
@DyingLightGame when is the next hyper weekend?
@OPERATIONiDROID hey Jon do you know if there's a working 3ds emulator and if there will be one on iOS eventually?
@DyingLightGame yep have it on disc (have the vanilla on disc as well)
@DyingLightGame hey guys just bought DL:TF on disc, how do i access the season pass? it says i have to pay for the dlcs in the ps store
@DyingLightGame how can I find gold weapons on ps4? I've had the game for 15 months and seriously found nothing not even on nightmare
@DyingLightGame is the season pass worth it guys? I've already got the following and the new dlcs. Still not sure please help
@DyingLightGame what's the % rate of finding gold weapons? I've been playing nightmare for weeks and found nothing. Help!!!
@DyingLightGame hey guys quick question with the bounty for the weekend. Do your kills restart every time chase mine are every time
@DyingLightGame @TechlandGames hey guys is the dead island remaster from you guys or another company? It looks awesome
@DOOM the beta is awesome!! Is there also going to be a campaign like the original?
@DyingLightGame does "the button" only work in the following not in old town or the slums?
@DyingLightGame thanks for the following!! I thought harran had an awesome ending but the following is crazy!! Im about to start it again
@OPERATIONiDROID hey do you still have a working download link and tutorial for Pokemon x/y on iPhone?
@DyingLightGame is the following out on the 9th in Australia or the 10th? I just want to make sure which day to take off work #dyinglight
@Drayano60 what about a hack that links up all regions? That would be awesome
@Drayano60 are you planning to release any other nds hacks this year for download or do we have to homebrew way from now on?
@DyingLightGame how much is the following going to be in Australia?
@DyingLightGame is the following dlc only going to be online or can we play it offline as well?
@OPERATIONiDROID is there anyway to play blaze back 2/volt white 2 on iNDS?
@iNDSapp @OPERATIONiDROID anyone having trouble playing Pokemon black on iNDS? For some reason my Pokemon don't gain exp
@iNDSapp hey guys was just wondering is there anyway to manually load roms onto iNDS or can you only download them in app

@OPERATIONiDROID @iEmulators can you play 3ds games on nds4ios as well or just normal ds Roma
@OPERATIONiDROID thanks mate
@iEmulators @OPERATIONiDROID is nds4ios still working threw the build store or has it been revoked as well?
@iEmulators do you know when nds4ios will up and running again?
